languages.text: Вольный Торговец пообещал{mf||а} помилование тем, кто поможет давить бунт на Веабосе-6, и каторжане охотно откликнулись на призыв.
The Rogue Trader promised pardon to those who would help crush the mutiny on Vheabos VI, and the convicts eagerly answered the call.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец пообещал{mf||а} помилование тем, кто поможет давить бунт на Веабосе-6, и каторжане охотно откликнулись на призыв.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader promised pardon to those who would help crush the mutiny on Vheabos VI, and the convicts eagerly answered the call.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a promis le pardon à ceux qui aideraient à mater la mutinerie sur Vhéabos-VI, et les condamnés ont répondu promptement à son appel.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader promised pardon to those who would help crush the mutiny on Vheabos VI, and the convicts eagerly answered the call.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a promis le pardon à ceux qui aideraient à mater la mutinerie sur Vhéabos-VI, et les condamnés ont répondu promptement à son appel.

languages.text: 自由開拓者はヴィアボス・VIの反乱の鎮圧に協力する者に恩赦を約束し、囚人たちはその呼びかけにこぞって応じた。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader promised pardon to those who would help crush the mutiny on Vheabos VI, and the convicts eagerly answered the call.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者はヴィアボス・VIの反乱の鎮圧に協力する者に恩赦を約束し、囚人たちはその呼びかけにこぞって応じた。

languages.text: 行商浪人做出了承诺，答应赦免那些协助镇压维博斯六号星暴乱的犯人，响应者蜂附云集。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader promised pardon to those who would help crush the mutiny on Vheabos VI, and the convicts eagerly answered the call.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人做出了承诺，答应赦免那些协助镇压维博斯六号星暴乱的犯人，响应者蜂附云集。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente prometió el perdón a quienes ayudaran a controlar el motín de Vheabos VI y los convictos respondieron con entusiasmo a la llamada.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader promised pardon to those who would help crush the mutiny on Vheabos VI, and the convicts eagerly answered the call.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente prometió el perdón a quienes ayudaran a controlar el motín de Vheabos VI y los convictos respondieron con entusiasmo a la llamada.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} versprach allen eine Begnadigung, die mithelfen, die Meuterei auf Vheabos-VI niederzuschlagen — und die Sträflinge folgten dem Ruf nur allzu gerne.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader promised pardon to those who would help crush the mutiny on Vheabos VI, and the convicts eagerly answered the call.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} versprach allen eine Begnadigung, die mithelfen, die Meuterei auf Vheabos-VI niederzuschlagen — und die Sträflinge folgten dem Ruf nur allzu gerne.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Vheabos VI'daki isyanı bastırmaya yardım edeceklere af sözü verdi ve hükümlüler de bu çağrıya hevesle yanıt verdi.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader promised pardon to those who would help crush the mutiny on Vheabos VI, and the convicts eagerly answered the call.
